meanings.definition: A unit of power equal to one million watts.
meanings.sent1: The solar farm generates multimegawatts of electricity every day.
meanings.sent2: The power plant has the capacity to produce multimegawatts of energy.
meanings.sent3: It would take multimegawatts of energy to power a spaceship to Mars.
meanings.sent4: Her enthusiasm for the project was like multimegawatts of energy, unstoppable and powerful.
meanings.sent5: The thunderstorm unleashed multimegawatts of energy, lighting up the sky.

meanings.definition: The capacity to produce or consume one million watts of power.
meanings.sent1: The wind turbine farm has the potential to generate multimegawatts of electricity.
meanings.sent2: The factory's energy demand is in the multimegawatts range.
meanings.sent3: Trying to power a city with a single battery would require multimegawatts of power!
meanings.sent4: Her determination to succeed was like multimegawatts of power, driving her forward.
meanings.sent5: The volcano erupted with multimegawatts of force, shaking the ground.
